page.title: 17Home Life
page.content: My house is a terraced house. I live in Rochdale. I have lots of friends at school, at mosque and around my home. My house is neat and tidy. Most of the time I eat chappatties with lamb. My mum makes triangular-shaped things called samosas. Sometimes my mum makes fishfingers, beans and chips. I enjoy them very much. My favourite games are Bull Dog, Ball Tig, Bottle of Poison and other fairytale games like Golden Girl, the Magic Worm and the Weather Witch. I like the way my mum designs and makes my clothes. I am a girl. I am ten years old. I was born in Pakistan and I came to live in England when I was three years old. Shazia Yasmin.
